com.accela.aa.emse.dom

Class AddressConditionScript

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.BaseAAScript
      • com.accela.aa.emse.dom.ConditionScript
        • com.accela.aa.emse.dom.AddressConditionScript
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.AddressConditionScriptService, com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.ConditionScriptService, com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.ScriptAble

    public class AddressConditionScript
extends ConditionScript
implements com.accela.aa.emse.dom.service.AddressConditionScriptService
     
 Accela Automation
 File: AddressConditionScript.java
 
 Accela, Inc.
 Copyright (C): 2001-2014
 
 Description:
 Provides the "aa.AddressCondition" object through which script writers can
 operate on an retrieve AddressCondition related objects.
 
 Notes:
 
 
 Revision History:
 2002-12-06 Kelvin Wu           initial version.
 11/01/2006 Michael Mao cache service object.
